title: ASUS Vivobook 16" Laptop - Indie Black (Intel Core i7-1355U/16GB RAM/1TB SSD/Windows 11) - English
description: Experience computing like never before with the ASUS Vivobook 16 laptop. Featuring a powerful Intel Core i7-1355U processor and 16GB of RAM, this laptop ensures lightning-fast performance. The massive 1TB SSD provides ample storage for your files. Its 16" WUXGA IPS display delivers breathtaking visuals with vibrant colours and sharp details, making it perfect for work and play.
features: 13th generation Intel Core i7-1355U CPU and 16GB DDR4 RAM enable smooth and efficient handling of even the most demanding applications
1TB SSD offers incredibly fast load times and ample storage space, allowing you to quickly access and store all your files
16-inch WUXGA (1920 x 1200) IPS display provides stunningly clear and vibrant visuals, perfect for both work and entertainment
NanoEdge ultra-thin bezels and 16:10 aspect ratio immerse you in visuals with an impressive 86% screen-to-body ratio
Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.3 wireless card offer faster, more reliable internet and seamless device connectivity
Sleek and lightweight design with just 1.88kg (4.14lb.) weight and 1.99cm (0.78in.) thickness makes it effortlessly portable and stylish

One USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (support power delivery), two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, one USB 2.0 Type-A, one HDMI 1.4, and one 3.5mm combo audio jack allow easy connectivity with all your existing peripherals, displays, and projectors
180-degree hinge allows you to lay the laptop flat, offering versatile viewing angles and easy collaboration with others
Fingerprint sensor and 720p HD camera with a convenient privacy shutter, make sure your data and personal space remain protected at all times
ASUS AI noise cancellation isolates unwanted noise from human speech for enhanced communication and improved conferencing experience
TUV Rheinland certification ensures low-blue light for eye care during extended use
ASUS ErgoSense Chiclet keyboard with Num-key, optimal click ratio, and a larger multi-finger touchpad boost your work efficiency
ASUS Antimicrobial Guard strategically applied to high-touch areas, provide an extra layer of protection for enhanced hygiene and cleanliness
Meets MIL-STD 810H military standards to guarantee unmatched reliability in harsh conditions
Preloaded Windows 11 Home offers a seamless and intuitive user experience with its advanced features and enhancements
